trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the name of the object when submitted with a form. HTML5 If specified, it must not be the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,代表与表单一起提交时对象的名称。HTML5如果指定，则不能为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the name of the parameter. It reflects the name attribute.
trans-unit.target: 是表示参数名称的 DOMString 。它反映了 name 属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the name of the target frame to which the resource applies.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,表示资源适用的目标框架的名称。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the namespace prefix of the node, or null if no prefix is specified.
trans-unit.target: 是表示节点名称空间前缀的 DOMString ;如果未指定前缀，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the reverse relationship of the linked resource from the resource to the document.
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMString ,表示从资源到文档的链接资源的反向关系。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the shape of the active area.
trans-unit.target: 是表示活动区域形状的 DOMString 。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the text color using either a named color or a color specified in the hexadecimal #RRGGBB format.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它使用命名的颜色或以十六进制 #RRGGBB 格式指定的颜色来表示文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the text of the document's title.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,表示文档标题的文本。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the type of content being loaded by the HTML link.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,表示HTML链接正在加载的内容的类型。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the type of style being applied by this statement.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,表示此语句要应用的样式类型。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the type of the bullets, "disc", "square" or "circle". As the standard way of defining the list type is via the CSS list-style-type property, use the CSSOM methods to set it via a script.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,表示项目符号的类型 "disc" ， "square" 或 "circle" 。由于定义列表类型的标准方法是通过CSS list-style-type 属性，因此请使用CSSOM方法通过脚本进行设置。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the value associated to the parameter. It reflects the value attribute.
trans-unit.target: 是表示与参数关联的值的 DOMString 。它反映了 value 属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing the version of the HTML Document Type Definition (DTD) that governs this document. This property should not be used any more as it is non-conforming. Simply omit it.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,表示管理此文档的HTML文档类型定义（DTD）的版本。由于该属性不符合规定，因此不能再使用。只需忽略它。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString structured as a comma-seperated list specifing the height of each column inside a frameset.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,结构为逗号分隔的列表，用于指定框架集中每一列的高度。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString structured as a comma-seperated list specifing the width of each column inside a frameset.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ,结构为逗号分隔的列表，用于指定框架集内每一列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that contains the URI of a long description of the frame.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，其中包含框架的详细说明的URI。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that corresponds to the CORS setting for this link element. See CORS settings attributes for details.
trans-unit.target: 是与该链接元素的CORS设置相对应的 DOMString 。有关详细信息，请参见CORS设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that indicates whether the browser should provide scrollbars for the frame.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它指示浏览器是否应为框架提供滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that indicates whether to create borders between frames.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，指示是否在帧之间创建边框。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that is responsible for the width of the border surrounding the image. This is now deprecated and the CSS border property should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，负责图像周围边框的宽度。现在不推荐使用此方法，而应使用CSS border 属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that refers to a low-quality (but faster to load) copy of the image.
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMString ，它引用图像的低质量（但加载速度更快）副本。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the hreflang HTML attribute, indicating the language of the linked resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 hreflang HTML属性的 DOMString ，它指示链接资源的语言。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the media HTML attribute, indicating the intended media for the linked resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 media HTML属性，指示了链接资源的预期媒体。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the referrerpolicy HTML attribute indicating which referrer to use.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 referrerpolicy HTML属性，该属性指示要使用的引用者。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the rel HTML attribute, specifying the relationship of the target object to the linked object.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它反映了 rel HTML属性，指定了目标对象与链接对象的关系。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the target HTML attribute, indicating where to display the linked resource.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the type HTML attribute, indicating the MIME type of the linked resource.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the alt HTML attribute, containing alternative text for the element.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 alt HTML属性的 DOMString ，包含元素的替代文本。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the coords HTML attribute, containing coordinates to define the hot-spot region.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the rel HTML attribute, indicating relationships of the current document to the linked resource.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the shape HTML attribute, indicating the shape of the hot-spot, limited to known values.

trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 href HTML属性的 DOMString ，其中包含文档中相对URL的基本URL。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the src HTML attribute, containing the address of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 src HTML属性的 DOMString ，其中包含资源的地址。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the type HTML attribute, containing the type of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它反映HTML type 属性，其中包含资源的类型。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the width HTML attribute, containing the displayed width of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它反映HTML属性的 width ，其中包含显示的资源宽度。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the color HTML attribute, containing either a named color or a color specified in the hexadecimal #RRGGBB format.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 color HTML属性，其中包含命名的颜色或以十六进制#RRGGBB格式指定的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the face HTML attribute, containing a comma-separated list of one or more font names.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 face HTML属性的 DOMString ，其中包含一个或多个字体名称的逗号分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the size HTML attribute, containing either a font size number ranging from 1 to 7 or a relative size to the size attribute of the <basefont> element, for example -2 or +1.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了HTML size 属性，其中包含1至7的字体大小编号或 <basefont> 元素的 size 属性的相对大小，例如-2或+1。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the height HTML attribute, indicating the height of the frame.
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMString ，反映了 height HTML属性，指示框架的高度。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the name HTML attribute, containing a name by which to refer to the frame.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它反映 name HTML属性，其中包含用来引用框架的名称。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the referrerpolicy HTML attribute indicating which referrer to use when fetching the linked resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 referrerpolicy HTML属性，该属性指示在获取链接的资源时使用哪个引荐来源网址。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the src HTML attribute, containing the address of the content to be embedded.

trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString 反映 width HTML属性，指示帧的宽度。

trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 alt HTML属性的 DOMString ，从而指示图像的后备上下文。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the referrerpolicy HTML attribute indicating which referrer to use in order to fetch the image.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the src HTML attribute, containing the full URL of the image including base URI.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 src HTML属性的 DOMString ，其中包含图像的完整URL，包括基本URI。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the usemap HTML attribute, containing a partial URL of a map element.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the referrerpolicy HTML attribute indicating which referrer to use.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 referrerpolicy HTML属性，该属性指示要使用的引用者。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the archive HTML attribute, containing a list of archives for resources for this object.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 archive HTML属性的 DOMString ，其中包含此对象资源的存档列表。

trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 data HTML属性，指定了资源数据的地址。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the height HTML attribute, specifying the displayed height of the resource in CSS pixels.

trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它反映了 standby HTML属性，指定了在对象加载时显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the usemap HTML attribute, specifying a <map> element to use.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the width HTML attribute, specifying the displayed width of the resource in CSS pixels.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the datetime HTML attribute, containing a machine-readable form of the element's date and time value.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the kind HTML attribute, indicating how the text track is meant to be used. Possible values are: subtitles, captions, descriptions, chapters, metadata.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它反映了 kind HTML属性，指示了如何使用文本轨道。可能的值包括：字幕，标题，描述，章节，元数据。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the label HTML attribute, indicating a user-readable title for the track.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the src HTML attribute, indicating the address of the text track data.

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the mediagroup HTML attribute, which indicates the name of the group of elements it belongs to. A group of media elements shares a common MediaController.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 mediagroup HTML属性，该属性指示它所属的元素组的名称。一组媒体元素共享一个公共 MediaController 。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the poster HTML attribute, which specifies an image to show while no video data is available.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 poster HTML属性，该属性指定在没有视频数据可用时要显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the preload HTML attribute, indicating what data should be preloaded, if any. Possible values are: none, metadata, auto.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 preload HTML属性，指示应预加载哪些数据（如果有）。可能的值为： none ， metadata ， auto 。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the src HTML attribute, which contains the URL of a media resource to use.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 src HTML属性的 DOMString ，其中包含要使用的媒体资源的URL。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the width HTML attribute, which specifies the width of the display area, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString 反映 width HTML属性，该属性指定了显示区域的宽度，在CSS像素。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the hreflang attribute, indicating the language of the linked resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 hreflang 属性的 DOMString ，它指示链接资源的语言。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the type attribute, indicating the MIME type of the linked resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 type 属性的 DOMString ，指示链接资源的MIME类型。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that reflects the ping attribute, containing a space-separated list of URLs to which, when the hyperlink is followed, POST requests with the body PING will be sent by the browser (in the background). Typically used for tracking.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映ping属性的 DOMString ，其中包含以空格分隔的URL列表，当跟随超链接时，浏览器将在后台发送带有正文 PING 的 POST 请求。通常用于跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that represents the background color for the document.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，代表文档的背景色。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that represents the color of active hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，表示活动超链接的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that represents the color of visited links.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，表示访问的链接的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that represents the content to display in the frame.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，表示要在框架中显示的内容。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that represents the description of the location of the background image resource. Note that this is not an URI, though some older version of some browsers do expect it.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，表示对背景图像资源位置的描述。请注意，这不是URI，尽管某些浏览器的某些旧版本确实希望使用它。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString that represents the foreground color of text.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，表示文本的前景色。

trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString 值，反映了 type 并定义了要显示的标记的类型。它可以具有以下值：

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString value reflecting the type and defining the kind of marker to be used to display. The values are browser dependent and have never been standardized.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString 值，反映了 type 并定义了要显示的标记的类型。这些值取决于浏览器，并且从未标准化。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString which represents an enumerated attribute indicating alignment of the caption with respect to the table.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，它表示枚举的属性，该属性指示标题相对于表的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString, reflecting the dir global attribute, representing the directionality of the element. Possible values are "ltr", "rtl", and "auto".
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMString ，反映了 dir 全局属性，表示元素的方向性。可能的值为 "ltr" ， "rtl" 和 "auto" 。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString, starting with '::', containing the name of the pseudo-element the animation runs on. If the animation doesn't run on a pseudo-element but on the element, an empty string: ''.
trans-unit.target: 是一个以 '::' 开头的 DOMString ，其中包含动画在其上运行的伪元素的名称。如果动画不是在伪元素上而是在元素上运行，则为空字符串： '' .

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString, starting with '::', containing the name of the pseudo-element the animation runs on. If the transition doesn't run on a pseudo-element but on the element, an empty string: ''.
trans-unit.target: 是一个以 '::' 开头的 DOMString ，其中包含动画在其上运行的伪元素的名称。如果过渡不是在伪元素上而是在元素上进行，则为空字符串： '' .

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString, where a value of "true" means the element is editable and a value of "false" means it isn't.
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMString ，其中值 "true" 表示元素是可编辑的，而值 "false" 表示元素不是可编辑的。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMTokenList that reflects the rel HTML attribute, as a list of tokens.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMTokenList ，它反映了 rel HTML属性，作为令牌列表。

trans-unit.source: Is a Element, the element immediately preceding the given one in the tree, or null if there is no sibling element.
trans-unit.target: 是 Element ，是树中给定​​元素之前的元素，如果没有同级元素，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLCollection representing a collection of the contained option elements.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 HTMLCollection ,表示所包含的option元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLElement representing the control with which the label is associated.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 HTMLElement ,表示与标签关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLFormElement object representing the form with which the labeled control is associated, or null if there is no associated control, or if that control isn't associated with a form. In other words, this is just a shortcut for HTMLLabelElement.control.form.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 HTMLFormElement 对象，它表示与标签控件关联的表单，如果没有关联的控件，或者该控件没有与表单关联，则为 null 。换句话说，这只是 HTMLLabelElement.control.form 的快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLFormElement reflecting the form that this button is associated with. If the button is a descendant of a form element, then this attribute is the ID of that form element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLFormElement 反映了与此按钮关联的表单。如果按钮是表单元素的后代，则此属性是该表单元素的ID。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLFormElement representing the <form> element it belongs too. It can have the null value, if <isindex> isn't part of any form.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 HTMLFormElement ,表示它也属于的 <form> 元素。如果 <isindex> 不属于任何形式，则它可以具有 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLTableCaptionElement representing the first <caption> that is a child of the element, or null if none is found. When set, if the object doesn't represent a <caption>, a DOMException with the HierarchyRequestError name is thrown. If a correct object is given, it is inserted in the tree as the first child of this element and the first <caption> that is a child of this element is removed from the tree, if any.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 HTMLTableCaptionElement ,表示表示元素的子元素的第一个 <caption> ；如果未找到，则为 null 。设置后，如果对象不表示 <caption> ，则抛出带有 HierarchyRequestError 名称的 DOMException 。如果给出了正确的对象，则将其作为该元素的第一个子元素插入树中，并将作为该元素的子元素的第一个 <caption> 从树中删除（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLTableSectionElement representing the first <tfoot> that is a child of the element, or null if none is found. When set, if the object doesn't represent a <tfoot>, a DOMException with the HierarchyRequestError name is thrown. If a correct object is given, it is inserted in the tree immediately before the first element that is neither a <caption>, a <colgroup>, nor a <thead>, or as the last child if there is no such element, and the first <tfoot> that is a child of this element is removed from the tree, if any.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 HTMLTableSectionElement ,表示表示元素的子元素的第一个 <tfoot> ；如果未找到，则为 null 。设置后，如果对象不表示 <tfoot> ，则抛出带有 HierarchyRequestError 名称的 DOMException 。如果给出了正确的对象，则将其插入树中紧接在第一个不是 <caption> ， <colgroup> 或 <thead> 的元素的前面，或者作为最后一个子元素（如果没有这样的元素）插入在树的紧前面，并且如果有此元素，则从树中删除作为该元素的子元素的第一个 <tfoot> 。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLTableSectionElement representing the first <thead> that is a child of the element, or null if none is found. When set, if the object doesn't represent a <thead>, a DOMException with the HierarchyRequestError name is thrown. If a correct object is given, it is inserted in the tree immediately before the first element that is neither a <caption>, nor a <colgroup>, or as the last child if there is no such element, and the first <thead> that is a child of this element is removed from the tree, if any.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 HTMLTableSectionElement ,表示表示元素的子元素的第一个 <thead> ；如果未找到，则为 null 。设置后，如果对象不表示 <thead> ，则抛出带有 HierarchyRequestError 名称的 DOMException 。如果给出了正确的对象，则将其插入树中紧接在第一个既不是 <caption> 也不是 <colgroup> 的第一个元素之前，或者作为最后一个子元素（如果没有这样的元素）和第一个 <thead> 从树中删除该元素的子元素（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean flag indicating if the area is inactive (true) or active (false).
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 标志，指示该区域是不活动的（ true ）还是活动的（ false ）。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean flag indicating if the total work to be done, and the amount of work already done, by the underlying process is calculable. In other words, it tells if the progress is measurable or not.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 标志，指示基础流程是否可以计算总工作量和已经完成的工作量。换句话说，它告诉进度是否可测量。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean flag indicating if the total work to be done, and the amount of work already done, by the underlying process is calculable. In other words, it tells if the progress is measurable or not. It defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 标志，指示基础流程是否可以计算总工作量和已经完成的工作量。换句话说，它告诉进度是否可测量。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean flag indicating if when discarding an EntityReference its whole sub-tree must be discarded at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 标志，指示在丢弃 EntityReference 时是否必须同时丢弃其整个子树。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating if, when discarding an EntityReference its whole sub-tree must be discarded at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示在丢弃 EntityReference 时是否必须同时丢弃其整个子树。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating that spacing between list items should be reduced.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示应减小列表项之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating that spacing between list items should be reduced. This property reflects the compact attribute only, it doesn't consider the line-height CSS property used for that behavior in modern pages.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示应减小列表项之间的间距。此属性仅反映 compact 属性，它不考虑在现代页面中用于该行为的 line-height CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating that spacing between list items should be reduced. This property reflects the compact attribute only, it doesn't consider the line-height CSS property used for that behavior in modern pages.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示应减小列表项之间的间距。此属性仅反映 compact 属性，它不考虑在现代页面中用于该行为的 line-height CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating that the form is not to be validated when it is submitted. If specified, this attribute overrides the novalidate attribute of the <form> element that owns this element.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示在提交表单时不对其进行验证。如果指定，则此属性将覆盖拥有此元素的 <form> 元素的 novalidate 属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether or not the control is disabled, meaning that it does not accept any clicks.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示是否禁用该控件，这表示它不接受任何单击。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether or not the control should have input focus when the page loads, unless the user overrides it, for example by typing in a different control. Only one form-associated element in a document can have this attribute specified.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示在页面加载时控件是否应具有输入焦点，除非用户覆盖它，例如通过键入其他控件。文档中只有一个与表单相关的元素可以指定此属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether the Payment Request API may be invoked inside a cross-origin iframe.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示是否可以在跨域iframe中调用“ 付款请求API”。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether the button is a candidate for constraint validation. It is false if any conditions bar it from constraint validation, including: its type property is reset or button; it has a datalist ancestor; or the disabled property is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示按钮是否是约束验证的候选对象。如果任何条件禁止约束验证，则为 false ，包括：其 type 属性为 reset 或 button ；它有一个数据列表祖先；或 disabled 属性设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether the inline frame is willing to be placed into full screen mode. See Using full-screen mode for details.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示嵌入式框架是否愿意置于全屏模式。有关详细信息，请参见使用全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating, when discarding an EntityReference its whole sub-tree must be discarded at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示在丢弃 EntityReference 时必须同时丢弃其整个子树。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean reflects the default HTML attribute, indicating that the track is to be enabled if the user's preferences do not indicate that another track would be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 反映 default HTML属性，指示如果用户的首选项未指示另一个轨道更合适，则将启用该轨道。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean representing whether the current stylesheet has been applied or not.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 表示是否已应用当前样式表。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that indicates the application would like to receive the best possible results. If true and if the device is able to provide a more accurate position, it will do so. Note that this can result in slower response times or increased power consumption (with a GPS chip on a mobile device for example). On the other hand, if false, the device can take the liberty to save resources by responding more quickly and/or using less power. Default: false.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，指示应用程序希望获得最佳结果。如果为 true ,并且设备能够提供更准确的位置，则它将这样做。请注意，这可能导致响应时间变慢或功耗增加（例如，在移动设备上使用GPS芯片）。另一方面，如果为 false ，则设备可以通过更快地响应和/或使用更少的功率来自由地节省资源。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that indicates whether or not cross-site Access-Control requests should be made using credentials such as cookies or authorization headers.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，指示是否应使用cookie或授权标头之类的凭据发出跨站点 Access-Control 请求。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that reflects the ismap HTML attribute, indicating that the image is part of a server-side image map.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，它反映了 ismap HTML属性，指示该图像是服务器端图像映射的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean value indicating if the element applies to the whole document (false) or only to the parent's sub-tree (true).
trans-unit.target: 一个 Boolean 值，指示元素是应用于整个文档（ false ）还是仅应用于父级的子树（ true ）。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean value indicating if the user agent is allowed to provide sorting mechanism for the table, if it supports such a feature. This property reflects the sortable attribute.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 值，指示是否允许用户代理为表提供排序机制（如果它支持这种功能）。此属性反映了 sortable 属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean value reflecting the reversed and defining if the numbering is descending, that is its value is true, or ascending (false).
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 值，反映了取 reversed 值并定义编号是递减的，即其值为 true 还是升序（ false ）。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean value representing whether or not the stylesheet is disabled (true) or not (false).
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 值，表示是否禁用样式表（true）或禁用（false）。

trans-unit.source: Is a boolean reflecting the open HTML attribute, indicating whether or not the element’s contents (not counting the <summary>) is to be shown to the user.
trans-unit.target: 是 boolean 反映 open HTML属性，表示该元素的内容是否（不算 <summary> ）是要显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: Is a boolean representing whether or not the whole list of children <option> is disabled (true) or not (false).
trans-unit.target: 是一个 boolean 表示是否禁用子代 <option> 的整个列表（true），或者是否禁用（false）。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMSettableTokenList describing a list of id of <th> elements that represents headers associated with the cell. It reflects the headers attribute.
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMSettableTokenList ,它描述表示与单元相关联的标头的 <th> 元素的 id 列表。它反映了 headers 属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMSettableTokenList that reflects the sandbox HTML attribute, indicating extra restrictions on the behavior of the nested content.
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMSettableTokenList ，它反映 sandbox HTML属性，指示对嵌套内容的行为有额外的限制。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMSettableTokenList that reflects the sizes HTML attribute, as a list of tokens.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 DOMSettableTokenList ，它以标记列表的形式反映HTML属性的 sizes 。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString describing the key system encrypting the stream.
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMString ,用于描述对流进行加密的密钥系统。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString reflecting the media HTML attribute, containing the intended type of the media resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 media HTML属性的 DOMString ，其中包含媒体资源的预期类型。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString reflecting the src HTML attribute, containing the URL for the media resource. The HTMLSourceElement.src property has a meaning only when the associated <source> element is nested in a media element that is a <video> or an <audio> element. It has no meaning and is ignored when it is nested in a <picture> element.
trans-unit.target: 是反映 src HTML属性的 DOMString ，其中包含媒体资源的URL。该 HTMLSourceElement.src 属性只有当相关联的含义 <source> 元素嵌套在作为媒体元素 <video> 或 <audio> 元素。它没有任何意义，当嵌套在 <picture> 元素中时将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString reflecting the srcset HTML attribute, containing a list of candidate images, separated by a comma (',', U+002C COMMA). A candidate image is a URL followed by a 'w' with the width of the images, or an 'x' followed by the pixel density.
trans-unit.target: 是一个反映 srcset HTML属性的 DOMString ，它包含候选图像列表，并用逗号（ ',', U+002C COMMA ）分隔。候选图像是URL，后跟带有图像宽度的 'w' ，或者是后跟像素密度的 'x' 。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString reflecting the type HTML attribute, containing the type of the media resource.
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMString ,它反映HTML type 属性，其中包含媒体资源的类型。

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMString representing image sizes between breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 是表示断点之间图像大小的 DOMString

trans-unit.source: Is a DOMStringList
trans-unit.target: 是 DOMStringList

trans-unit.source: Is a Float32Array of numbers describing the distortion to apply.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Float32Array 数字，用于描述要应用的失真。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLMenuElement representing the contextual menu associated with the element. It may be null.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 HTMLMenuElement ,表示与该元素关联的上下文菜单。它可以为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Is a HTMLMenuElement representing the menu element to be displayed if the button is clicked and is of type="menu".
trans-unit.target: 是 HTMLMenuElement ,表示如果单击按钮并且 type="menu" 要显示的菜单元素。

trans-unit.source: Is a MediaController object that represents the media controller assigned to the element, or null if none is assigned.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 MediaController 对象，代表分配给该元素的媒体控制器；如果未分配，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating if the element can be dragged.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示是否可以拖动该元素。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating if the element can receive input focus via the tab key.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示元素是否可以通过Tab键接收输入焦点。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating if the element is an undo scope host, or not.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示该元素是否是撤消作用域主机。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating if the element is hidden or not.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示元素是否隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating if the matrix contains a 2D matrix and only accept 2D transformations.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示矩阵是否包含2D矩阵并且仅接受2D转换。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating wether an import script can be executed in user agents that support module scripts.
trans-unit.target: 是 Boolean 指示是否可以在支持模块脚本的用户代理中执行导入脚本。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether the bubbling of the event has been canceled or not.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示事件的冒泡是否已取消。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether the byte order marker is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示是否忽略字节顺序标记。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether the error mode is fatal.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean 指示错误模式是否致命。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indicating whether the user agent must act as though the given node is absent for the purposes of user interaction events, in-page text searches ("find in page"), and text selection.

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean indincating if the matrix identity, that is a matrix with 1 on the components of its diagonal, and 0 elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，表示矩阵是否相同，即矩阵的对角线成分为 1 ，其他位置为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean reflecting the moz-opaque HTML attribute of the <canvas> element. It lets the canvas know whether or not translucency will be a factor. If the canvas knows there's no translucency, painting performance can be optimized. This is only supported in Mozilla-based browsers, use the standardized canvas.getContext('2d', { alpha: false }) instead.
trans-unit.target: 是 Boolean 反映 moz-opaque 的的HTML属性 <canvas> 元素。它让画布知道半透明性是否会成为一个因素。如果画布知道没有透明感，则可以优化绘画性能。仅基于Mozilla的浏览器支持此功能，请改用标准化的 canvas.getContext('2d', { alpha: false }) 。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean representing the item scope.
trans-unit.target: 是表示项目范围的 Boolean 。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean representing the translation.
trans-unit.target: 是表示翻译的 Boolean 。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that controls spell-checking. It is present on all HTML elements, though it doesn't have an effect on all of them.
trans-unit.target: 是控制拼写检查的 Boolean 。它在所有HTML元素上都存在，尽管它对所有元素没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that determines if the pitch of the sound will be preserved. If set to false, the pitch will adjust to the speed of the audio. This is implemented with prefixes in Firefox (mozPreservesPitch) and WebKit (webkitPreservesPitch).
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，确定是否将保留声音的音调。如果设置为 false ，则音调将调整为音频速度。这是通过Firefox（ mozPreservesPitch ）和WebKit（ webkitPreservesPitch ）中的前缀实现的。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that determines whether audio is muted. true if the audio is muted and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，用于确定音频是否被静音。 true 如果音频静音和 false ，否则。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that reflects the declare HTML attribute, indicating that this is a declaration, not an instantiation, of the object.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，它反映 declare HTML属性，指示这是对象的声明，而不是实例。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that reflects the typemustmatch HTML attribute, indicating if the resource specified by data must only be played if it matches the type attribute.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，它反映 typemustmatch HTML属性，指示是否仅在 data 指定的资源与 type 属性匹配时才播放该数据。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that reflects the controls HTML attribute, indicating whether user interface items for controlling the resource should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，它反映 controls HTML属性，指示是否应显示用于控制资源的用户界面项。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that reflects the loop HTML attribute, which indicates whether the media element should start over when it reaches the end.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，它反映 loop HTML属性，该属性指示媒体元素在到达末尾时是否应该重新开始。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that reflects the muted HTML attribute, which indicates whether the media element's audio output should be muted by default.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，反映了 muted HTML属性，该属性指示默认情况下是否应将媒体元素的音频输出静音。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean that sets or returns the remote playback state, indicating whether the media element is allowed to have a remote playback UI.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Boolean ，它设置或返回远程回放状态，指示是否允许媒体元素具有远程回放UI。

trans-unit.source: Is a Boolean value:
trans-unit.target: 是 Boolean 值：

trans-unit.source: Is a Number representing the left scroll offset of the element.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Number 表示元素的左滚动偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Is a Uint8ClampedArray representing a one-dimensional array containing the data in the RGBA order, with integer values between 0 and 255 (included).
trans-unit.target: 是一个 Uint8ClampedArray ,它表示一个一维数组，其中包含RGBA顺序的数据，其整数值在 0 到 255 之间（包括）。

trans-unit.source: Is a MediaStream containing a single AudioMediaStreamTrack with the same number of channels as the node itself. You can use this property to get a stream out of the audio graph and feed it into another construct, such as a Media Recorder.
trans-unit.target: 是包含单个 AudioMediaStreamTrack 的 MediaStream ，该AudioMediaStreamTrack具有与节点本身相同的通道数。您可以使用此属性从音频图表中获取流，并将其馈入另一个构造（例如Media Recorder）。

trans-unit.source: Is a MediaStream representing the media to play or that has played in the current HTMLMediaElement, or null if not assigned.
trans-unit.target: 是 MediaStream ,表示要播放的媒体或在当前 HTMLMediaElement 中播放过的媒体；如果未分配，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Is a NodeList that represents a list of <label> elements that are labels for this button.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 NodeList ，表示 <label> 元素的列表，这些元素是此按钮的标签。

trans-unit.source: Is a USVString containing that reflects the href HTML attribute, containing a valid URL of a linked resource.
trans-unit.target: 是包含 USVString 的内容，它反映了 href HTML属性，其中包含链接资源的有效URL。

trans-unit.source: Is a USVString containing the fragment identifier (including the leading hash mark (#)), if any, in the referenced URL.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 USVString ，在引用的URL中包含片段标识符（包括前导哈希标记（＃））（如果有）。

trans-unit.target: 是在引用的URL中包含主机名的 USVString 。

trans-unit.source: Is a USVString containing the path name component, if any, of the referenced URL.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 USVString ,其中包含引用URL的路径名部分（如果有）。

trans-unit.target: 是 USVString ,表示引用的URL中的主机名。

trans-unit.target: 是 USVString ,表示引用的URL的端口组件（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Is a USVString representing the protocol component, including trailing colon (':'), of the referenced URL.
trans-unit.target: 是 USVString ,它表示所引用URL 的协议组件，包括结尾的冒号（' : '）。

trans-unit.source: Is a USVString representing the search element, including leading question mark ('?'), if any, of the referenced URL.
trans-unit.target: USVString 是否表示搜索元素，包括参考URL的前导问号（' ? '）（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Is a USVString that reflects the href HTML attribute, containing a valid URL of a linked resource.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 USVString ，反映了 href HTML属性，其中包含链接资源的有效URL。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the calculated width of a segment of inline text in CSS pixels. It takes into account the current font of the context.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值，以CSS像素为单位给出一段内联文本的计算宽度。它考虑了上下文的当前字体。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline attribute to the bottom of the bounding rectangle of all the fonts used to render the text, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double ，以从 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到用于渲染文本的所有字体的边界矩形底部的距离为单位，以CSS像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline attribute to the bottom of the bounding rectangle used to render the text, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值，以 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到用于渲染文本的边界矩形底部的距离（以CSS像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline attribute to the top of the bounding rectangle used to render the text, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值，以CSS像素表示从 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到用于渲染文本的边界矩形顶部的距离。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline attribute to the top of the highest bounding rectangle of all the fonts used to render the text, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double ，以从 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到用于渲染文本的所有字体的最高边界矩形的顶部，以CSS像素为单位给出距离。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline property to the alphabetic baseline of the line box, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值，以 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到该线框的字母基线的距离（以CSS像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline property to the bottom of the em square in the line box, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值,它提供了从 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到行框中em正方形底部的距离（以CSS像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline property to the hanging baseline of the line box, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值，以 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到线框的悬挂基线之间的距离为单位，以CSS像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline property to the ideographic baseline of the line box, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值，以 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到线框的表意基线之间的距离为单位，以CSS像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline property to the top of the em square in the line box, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值,它给出了由 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textBaseline 属性指示的水平线到行框中em正方形顶部的距离（以CSS像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance parallel to the baseline from the alignment point given by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textAlign property to the left side of the bounding rectangle of the given text, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值,它提供从 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textAlign 属性给出的对齐点到给定文本的边界矩形的左侧与基线平行的距离，以CSS像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Is a double giving the distance parallel to the baseline from the alignment point given by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.textAlign property to the right side of the bounding rectangle of the given text, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值,它提供从 CanvasRenderingContext2D.textAlign 属性给出的对齐点到给定文本的边界矩形的右侧与基线平行的距离，以CSS像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Is a double indicating the audio volume, from 0.0 (silent) to 1.0 (loudest).
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 精度整数，指示音频音量，从0.0（静音）到1.0（最大）。

trans-unit.source: Is a double indicating the current playback time in seconds. Setting this value seeks the media to the new time.
trans-unit.target: 是一个以秒为单位指示当前播放时间的 double 精度值。设置此值可将媒体搜索到新的时间。

trans-unit.source: Is a double indicating the default playback rate for the media.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值，指示媒体的默认播放速率。

trans-unit.source: Is a double that indicates the rate at which the media is being played back.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double ，指示媒体正在播放的速率。

trans-unit.source: Is a double that provides access to the fragment end time if the media element has a fragment URI for currentSrc, otherwise it is equal to the media duration.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 元素，如果media元素具有用于 currentSrc 的片段URI ，则提供对片段结束时间的访问，否则等于媒体持续时间。

trans-unit.source: Is a double value reflecting the content attribute of the same name, limited to numbers greater than zero. Its default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 double 值，它反映相同名称的content属性，且限制为大于零的数字。其默认值为 1.0 。

trans-unit.source: Is a double value that reflects the current value; if the progress bar is an indeterminate progress bar, it returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 是反映当前值的 double 精度值；如果进度条是不确定的进度条，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Is a float giving the amount of time the animation has been running, in seconds, when this event fired, excluding any time the animation was paused. For an "animationstart" event, elapsedTime is 0.0 unless there was a negative value for animation-delay, in which case the event will be fired with elapsedTime containing (-1 * delay).
trans-unit.target: 是一个 float 给出触发该事件时动画运行的时间（以秒为单位），不包括动画暂停的任何时间。对于 "animationstart" 事件，除非 animation-delay 的值为负，否则 elapsedTime 为 0.0 ，在这种情况下，将使用 elapsedTime 包含 (-1 * delay ) 的事件来触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Is a float giving the amount of time the transition has been running, in seconds, when this event fired. This value is not affected by the transition-delay property.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 float ，表示触发此事件时转换已运行的时间（以秒为单位）。此值不受 transition-delay 属性的影响。

trans-unit.source: Is a float representing the amount of gain reduction currently applied by the compressor to the signal.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 float 表示压缩器当前施加到信号的增益降低量。

trans-unit.source: Is a function that is Initially null, Web content can set this to a JavaScript function that will be called if the page is printed. This function can then redraw the canvas at a higher resolution that is suitable for the printer being used. See this blog post.
trans-unit.target: Web内容是一个最初为null 的 function ，可以将其设置为一个JavaScript函数，如果打印该页面，该函数将被调用。然后，此功能可以以适合所用打印机的更高分辨率重新绘制画布。请参阅此博客文章。

trans-unit.source: Is a long containing the element's position in the tabbing order.
trans-unit.target: 是包含按跳位顺序的元素位置的 long 。

trans-unit.source: Is a long containing the position of the element in the tabbing navigation order for the current document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 long 整数，包含当前文档的选项卡式导航顺序中元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Is a long indicating the ordinal position of the list element inside a given <ol>. It reflects the value attribute of the HTML <li> element, and can be smaller than 0. If the <li> element is not a child of an <ol> element, the property has no meaning.
trans-unit.target: 一个 long 整数，指示给定 <ol> 中 list元素的顺序位置。它反映HTML <li> 元素的 value 属性，并且可以小于 0 。如果 <li> 元素不是 <ol> 元素的子元素，则该属性没有意义。

trans-unit.source: Is a long representing the horizontal space in pixels around the control.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 long 整数，表示控件周围的水平空间（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Is a long representing the position of the element in the tabbing navigation order for the current document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 long 整数，表示元素在当前文档的选项卡式导航顺序中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Is a long representing the position of the element in the tabbing order.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 long 整数，表示按Tab键顺序排列的元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Is a long representing the space above and below the image.
trans-unit.target: 一个 long 代表图像上方和下方的空间。

trans-unit.source: Is a long representing the space on either side of the image.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 long 整数，表示图像两边的空间。

trans-unit.source: Is a long that represents this element's position in the tabbing order.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 long 整数，表示该元素在制表顺序中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Is a long value reflecting the start and defining the value of the first number of the first element of the list.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 long 数值，反映 start 并定义列表中第一个元素的第一个数字的值。

trans-unit.source: Is a long value reflecting the obsolete width attribute, containing a fixed-size length for the <pre> element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 long 数值，反映了过时的 width 属性，其中包含 <pre> 元素的固定大小的长度。

trans-unit.source: Is a unsigned long that indicates the number of samples that will be returned in the framebuffer of each MozAudioAvailable event. This number is a total for all channels, and by default is set to be the number of channels * 1024 (e.g., 2 channels * 1024 samples = 2048 total).
trans-unit.target: 一个 unsigned long 整数，指示将在每个 MozAudioAvailable 事件的帧缓冲区中返回的样本数。此数字是所有通道的总数，默认情况下设置为通道数* 1024（例如2个通道* 1024个样本= 2048个总数）。

trans-unit.source: Is a unsigned long that reflects the height HTML attribute, indicating the rendered height of the image in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 unsigned long ，反映了HTML 的 height 属性，以CSS像素表示图像的渲染高度。

trans-unit.source: Is a unsigned long that reflects the width HTML attribute, indicating the rendered width of the image in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 unsigned long ，反映了 width HTML属性，显示图像的CSS像素的呈现宽度。

trans-unit.source: Is a JavaScript Object that is concerned by the event.
trans-unit.target: 是事件所关注的JavaScript Object 。

trans-unit.source: Is a TouchEventInit dictionary, having the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 是Touch EventInit 词典，具有以下字段：

trans-unit.source: Is a boolean. If true, the request will be sent without cookie and authentication headers.
trans-unit.target: 是一个布尔值。如果为真,则发送请求时将不使用cookie和验证头。

trans-unit.source: Is a boolean. If true, the same origin policy will not be enforced on the request.
trans-unit.target: 是一个布尔值。如果为真,则不会对该请求执行相同的来源策略。

trans-unit.source: Is a boolean. It indicates whether or not the object represents a background service request.
trans-unit.target: 是一个布尔值。它表示该对象是否代表后台服务请求。

trans-unit.source: Is a constructor creating an HTMLOptionElement object. It has four values: the text to display, text, the value associated, value, the value of defaultSelected, and the value of selected. The last three values are optional.
trans-unit.target: 是创建 HTMLOptionElement 对象的构造函数。它具有四个值：要显示的文本， text ，关联的 value ，value， defaultSelected 的值和 selected 的值。最后三个值是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Is a double value describing the angle, in degrees, of a cone inside of which there will be no volume reduction.
trans-unit.target: 是描述圆锥体内部不会有体积缩小的角度的双值,单位为度。

trans-unit.source: Is a double value representing the averaging constant with the last analysis frame — basically, it makes the transition between values over time smoother.
trans-unit.target: 是一个双精度值，代表最后一个分析帧的平均常数，基本上，它使随时间变化的值之间的过渡更加平滑。

trans-unit.source: Is a double value representing the maximum power value in the scaling range for the FFT analysis data, for conversion to unsigned byte values — basically, this specifies the maximum value for the range of results when using getByteFrequencyData().
trans-unit.target: 是一个双精度值，代表FFT分析数据的缩放范围内的最大功率值，用于转换为无符号字节值—基本上，这指定了使用 getByteFrequencyData() 时结果范围的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Is a double value representing the minimum power value in the scaling range for the FFT analysis data, for conversion to unsigned byte values — basically, this specifies the minimum value for the range of results when using getByteFrequencyData().
trans-unit.target: 是一个双精度值，代表FFT分析数据的缩放范围内的最小功率值，用于转换为无符号字节值—基本上，这指定了使用 getByteFrequencyData() 时结果范围的最小值。

trans-unit.source: Is a double value representing the speed of sound, in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: 是表示声速的双精度值，以米/秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Is a jsonizer returning a json object representing the Performance object.
trans-unit.target: 是jsonizer返回代表 Performance 对象的json 对象。

trans-unit.source: Is a jsonizer returning a json object representing the PerformanceNavigation object.
trans-unit.target: 是一个jsonizer返回代表 PerformanceNavigation 对象的json 对象。

trans-unit.source: Is a list of origins the the frame is allowed to display content from. This attribute also accepts the values self and src which represent the origin in the iframe's src attribute. The default value is src.
trans-unit.target: 是允许框架显示内容的来源列表。该属性还接受值 self 和 src ，它们代表iframe src属性中的原点。默认值为 src 。

trans-unit.source: Is a live HTMLCollection representing the <area> elements associated to this <map>.
trans-unit.target: 是一个实时 HTMLCollection ,表示与此 <map> 关联的 <area> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Is a positive integer reflecting the height HTML attribute of the <canvas> element interpreted in CSS pixels. When the attribute is not specified, or if it is set to an invalid value, like a negative, the default value of 150 is used.
trans-unit.target: 是一个正 integer 反映以CSS像素解释的 <canvas> 元素的 height HTML属性。如果未指定属性，或者将其设置为无效值（例如负数），则使用默认值 150 。

trans-unit.source: Is a positive integer reflecting the width HTML attribute of the <canvas> element interpreted in CSS pixels. When the attribute is not specified, or if it is set to an invalid value, like a negative, the default value of 300 is used.
trans-unit.target: 是一个正 integer 反映 <canvas> 元素的HTML属性 width ，以CSS像素表示。如果未指定属性，或者将其设置为无效值（例如负数），则使用默认值 300 。

trans-unit.source: Is a positive long value indicating the maximum age in milliseconds of a possible cached position that is acceptable to return. If set to 0, it means that the device cannot use a cached position and must attempt to retrieve the real current position. If set to Infinity the device must return a cached position regardless of its age. Default: 0.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 long 整数正值，指示可接受的可能缓存位置的最大寿命（以毫秒为单位），可以返回。如果设置为 0 ，则意味着设备无法使用缓存的位置，必须尝试检索实际的当前位置。如果设置为 Infinity ,则设备必须返回缓存的位置，而不管其寿命如何。默认值：0

trans-unit.source: Is a positive long value representing the maximum length of time (in milliseconds) the device is allowed to take in order to return a position. The default value is Infinity, meaning that getCurrentPosition() won't return until the position is available.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 long 整数正值，表示允许设备返回位置的最大时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。默认值为 Infinity ，这意味着 getCurrentPosition() 在该位置可用之前不会返回。

trans-unit.source: Is a read-only map of media key statuses by key IDs.
trans-unit.target: 是按密钥ID划分的媒体密钥状态的只读地图。

trans-unit.source: Is a sequence of Transferable objects that are transferred with the message. The ownership of these objects is given to the destination side and they are no longer usable on the sending side.
trans-unit.target: 是随消息一起 Transferable 的一系列Transferable对象。这些对象的所有权被赋予目标端，并且它们在发送端不再可用。

trans-unit.source: Is a snapshot of HTML Living Standard.
trans-unit.target: 是HTML Living Standard的快照。

trans-unit.source: Is a snapshot of HTML Living Standard. No change from Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 HTML Specification.
trans-unit.target: 是HTML Living Standard的快照。与文档对象模型（DOM）2级HTML规范相同。

trans-unit.source: Is a string containing the ID of the labeled control. This reflects the for attribute.
trans-unit.target: 是一个字符串，其中包含带有标签的控件的ID。这反映了 for 属性。

trans-unit.source: Is a string value defining the kind of filtering algorithm the node is implementing.
trans-unit.target: 是一个字符串值,定义了节点正在实现的过滤算法的种类。

trans-unit.source: Is an Blob associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 是与事件关联的 Blob 。

trans-unit.source: Is an a-rateAudioParam representing detuning of the frequency in cents.
trans-unit.target: 是一个以速率为单位的 AudioParam ,表示频率的失调（以美分为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Is an a-rateAudioParam representing the amount of delay to apply.
trans-unit.target: 是一个速率 AudioParam ,表示要应用的延迟量。

trans-unit.source: Is an a-rateAudioParam representing the amount of gain to apply. You have to set AudioParam.value or use the methods of AudioParam to change the effect of gain.
trans-unit.target: 是一个速率 AudioParam ,表示要应用的增益量。你必须设置 AudioParam.value 或使用的方法 AudioParam 改变增益的效果。

trans-unit.source: Is an a-rateAudioParam representing the amount of panning to apply.
trans-unit.target: 是一个速率 AudioParam ,表示要应用的平移量。

trans-unit.source: Is an a-rateAudioParam, a double representing a Q factor, or quality factor.
trans-unit.target: 是a速率的 AudioParam ，代表Q因子或质因子的双精度。

trans-unit.source: Is an a-rateAudioParam, a double representing a frequency in the current filtering algorithm measured in hertz (Hz).
trans-unit.target: 是a速率的 AudioParam ，一个双精度值，表示当前滤波算法中的频率（以赫兹（Hz）为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Is an a-rateAudioParam, a double representing the gain used in the current filtering algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 是a速率的 AudioParam ，是表示当前过滤算法中使用的增益的双精度值。

trans-unit.source: Is an Element, the element immediately following the given one in the tree, or null if there's no sibling node.
trans-unit.target: 是 Element ，紧随树中给定元素的元素；如果没有同级节点，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Is an EventListener that is called whenever an ErrorEvent of type error bubbles through the worker.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 EventListener ，只要类型为 error 的 ErrorEvent 在工作线程中冒泡，就会被调用。

trans-unit.source: Is an EventTarget representing a secondary target for this event. As in some cases (like when tabbing in or out a page), this property may be set to null for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 EventTarget ,表示此事件的辅助目标。与某些情况下一样（例如，在页面中跳入或跳出页面时），出于安全原因，可以将此属性设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Is an EventHandler called when a message event is received, that is when a message is coming from the source.
trans-unit.target: 是在收到 message 事件（即消息来自源）时调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: Is an EventHandler called when an open event is received, that is when the connection was just opened.
trans-unit.target: 是在接收到 open 事件（即刚刚打开连接）时调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: Is an EventHandler called when an error occurs and the error event is dispatched on an EventSource object.
trans-unit.target: 是在发生错误并且在 EventSource 对象上分派 error 事件时调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: Is an EventHandler called when processing is terminated, that is when the complete event (of type OfflineAudioCompletionEvent) is raised, after the event-based version of OfflineAudioContext.startRendering() is used.
trans-unit.target: 是在处理终止时（即在使用基于事件的版本的 OfflineAudioContext.startRendering() 之后引发 complete 事件（ OfflineAudioCompletionEvent 类型的 EventHandler 调用的EventHandler。

trans-unit.source: Is an EventHandler called whenever an object receives a message event.
trans-unit.target: 当对象接收到 message 事件时，是否调用 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the MessageError event is raised.

trans-unit.source: Is an integer-based TypedArray, that is an Int8Array, a Uint8Array, an Int16Array, a Uint16Array, an Int32Array, or a Uint32Array. All elements in the array are going to be overridden with random numbers.

trans-unit.source: Is an optional NodeFilter, that is an object with a method acceptNode, which is called by the TreeWalker to determine whether or not to accept a node that has passed the whatToShow check.

trans-unit.source: Is an optional unsigned long representing a bitmask created by combining the constant properties of NodeFilter. It is a convenient way of filtering for certain types of node. It defaults to 0xFFFFFFFF representing the SHOW_ALL constant.

trans-unit.source: It is because of the cross-domain script security restriction (also referred as the "Same Origin Policy"). A script loaded in a window (or frame) from a distinct origin (domain name) cannot get nor set properties of another window (or frame) or the properties of any of its HTML objects coming from another distinct origin (domain name). Therefore, before executing a script targeting a secondary window, the browser in the main window will verify that the secondary window has the same domain name.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为跨域脚本的安全性限制（也称为“相同来源策略”）。从不同的来源（域名）加载到窗口（或框架）中的脚本无法获取或设置另一个窗口（或框架）的属性，也不能获取或设置来自另一个不同的来源（域名）的任何HTML对象的属性。因此，在执行针对次要窗口的脚本之前，主窗口中的浏览器将验证次要窗口具有相同的域名。

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the path attribute does not protect against unauthorized reading of the cookie from a different path. The only way to protect the cookie is by using a different domain or subdomain, due to the same origin policy.

trans-unit.source: It is usually undesirable for a user to receive a lot of notifications in a short space of time — for example, what if a messenger application notified a user for each incoming message, and they were being sent a lot? To avoid spamming the user with too many notifications, it's possible to modify the pending notifications queue, replacing single or multiple pending notifications with a new one.
trans-unit.target: 用户通常不希望在短时间内收到大量通知，例如，如果Messenger应用程序为每个传入消息通知用户，并且发送了很多通知，该怎么办？为了避免向用户发送过多的通知，可以修改挂起的通知队列，用一个新的替换一个或多个挂起的通知。

trans-unit.source: It may be worth noting that the zero meridian (also known as the prime meridian or the reference meridian) is not precisely the same as the Greenwhich meridian that most people think of. This is the same standard used by the Global Positioning System (GPS).

trans-unit.source: It represents the orientation of the screen when it is in its primary landscape mode. A screen is considered in its primary landscape mode if the device is held in its normal position and that position is in landscape, or if the normal position of the device is in portrait and the device held is turned by 90° clockwise. The normal position is device dependant.
trans-unit.target: 它代表屏幕在其主要横向模式下的方向。如果将设备保持在其正常位置且该位置处于横向，或者设备的正常位置为纵向且将设备保持在顺时针方向旋转90°，则认为屏幕处于其主要横向模式。正常位置取决于设备。

trans-unit.source: It represents the orientation of the screen when it is in its primary portrait mode. A screen is considered in its primary portrait mode if the device is held in its normal position and that position is in portrait, or if the normal position of the device is in landscape and the device held turned by 90° clockwise. The normal position is device dependant.
trans-unit.target: 它代表屏幕在其主要纵向模式下的方向。如果设备保持在其正常位置并且该位置处于纵向，或者设备的正常位置处于横向并且保持设备顺时针旋转90°，则认为屏幕处于其主要纵向模式。正常位置取决于设备。

trans-unit.source: It represents the orientation of the screen when it is in its secondary landscape mode. The normal position is device dependant.
trans-unit.target: 它代表屏幕处于其第二横向模式时的方向。如果所握持的设备与其正常位置相距180°并且该位置处于横向，或者设备的正常位置为纵向且所握持的设备逆时针旋转90°，则认为该屏幕处于辅助横向模式。正常位置取决于设备。

trans-unit.source: It represents the orientation of the screen when it is in its secondary portrait mode. trans-unit.source: It’s also worth noting that the channel for performing signaling doesn’t even need to be over the network. One peer can output a data object that can be printed out, physically carried (on foot or by carrier pigeon) to another device, entered into that device, and a response then output by that device to be returned on foot, and so forth, until the WebRTC peer connection is open. It'd be very high latency but it could be done.
trans-unit.target: 还值得注意的是，执行信令的通道甚至不需要通过网络。一个对等方可以输出一个数据对象，该对象可以打印出来，可以物理携带（步行或由信鸽携带）到另一台设备，输入到该设备中，然后该设备输出响应以步行方式返回，依此类推，直到WebRTC对等连接打开。延迟会非常高，但是可以做到。

trans-unit.source: It's a good idea to save the canvas state before doing any transformations. In most cases, it is just easier to call the restore method than having to do a reverse translation to return to the original state. Also if you're translating inside a loop and don't save and restore the canvas state, you might end up missing part of your drawing, because it was drawn outside the canvas edge.
trans-unit.target: 在进行任何转换之前保存画布状态是一个好主意。在大多数情况下，调用 restore 方法比必须执行反向转换以返回到原始状态要容易得多。另外，如果要在循环内平移并且不保存和恢复画布状态，则可能会丢失图形的一部分，因为它是在画布边缘之外绘制的。

trans-unit.source: It's important to highlight that the signature for assertion uses a different key pair than attestation. An assertion is signed using the key pair for a service, which was generated during registration. An attestation is signed using the attestation private key and attestation certificate that were burned into all models of the same device. (Except in the case of self-attestation.)
trans-unit.target: 需要强调的是,断言的签名与认证使用的密钥对不同。断言使用服务的密钥对进行签名,该密钥对是在注册期间生成的。断言是使用同一设备的所有型号中刻录的断言私钥和断言证书来签署的。自我认证的情况除外)。

trans-unit.source: It's important to keep in mind that a single ICE session may result in the controlling agent choosing more than one candidate pair. Each time it does so and shares that information with the controlled agent, the two peers reconfigure their connection to use the new configuration described by the new candidate pair.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要记住,一个ICE会话可能导致控制代理选择一个以上的候选对。每次它这样做并与控制代理共享该信息时,两个对等体都会重新配置其连接,以使用新的候选对所描述的新配置。

trans-unit.source: It's important to keep in mind that each end of the channel has its own RTCDataChannel object.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要记住，通道的每一端都有自己的 RTCDataChannel 对象。

trans-unit.source: It's important to keep in mind that the value of QP can change periodically—even every frame—so it's difficult to know for certain how substantial the compression is. The best you can do is make an estimate. You can, for example, use the value of RTCReceivedRtpStreamStats.framesDecoded if receiving the media or RTCSentRtpStreamStats.framesEncoded if sending it to get the number of frames handled so far, and compute an average from there. See Calculating average quantization below for a function that does this.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要记住，QP的值可能会定期更改（甚至是每帧），因此很难确定压缩的强度。您能做的最好的就是估算。你可以，例如，使用的值 RTCReceivedRtpStreamStats.framesDecoded 如果接收媒体或 RTCSentRtpStreamStats.framesEncoded 如果发送它获得迄今为止所处理的帧数，平均从那里计算。有关执行此操作的功能，请参见下面的计算平均量化。

trans-unit.source: It's important to keep in mind that there's no way to correlate these remote candidates with compatible local candidates. To find the best match found so far, call RTCIceTransport.getSelectedCandidatePair().
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要记住，没有办法将这些远程候选者与兼容的本地候选者相关联。要找到到目前为止找到的最佳匹配项，请调用 RTCIceTransport.getSelectedCandidatePair() 。

trans-unit.source: It's important to note here that although WebRTC does not require the two peers on an RTCPeerConnection to know one another's true IP addresses, the ip property on RTCIceCandidatecan expose more information about the source of the remote peer than the user expects. The IP address can be used to derive information about the remote device's location, network topology, and so forth. It can also be used for fingerprinting purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这里需要特别注意的是，尽管WebRTC不需要 RTCPeerConnection 上的两个对等方知道彼此的真实IP地址，但 RTCIceCandidate 上的 ip 属性可以提供比用户期望的更多有关远程对等方源的信息。IP地址可用于派生有关远程设备的位置，网络拓扑等信息。它也可以用于指纹识别。

trans-unit.source: It's important to note that in many cases, both touch and mouse events get sent (in order to let non-touch-specific code still interact with the user). If you use touch events, you should call preventDefault() to keep the mouse event from being sent as well.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要注意，在许多情况下，触摸和鼠标事件都会发送（为了让非触摸特定的代码仍与用户交互）。如果使用触摸事件，则应调用 preventDefault() 来防止鼠标事件也被发送。

trans-unit.source: It's important to note that the server doesn't need to understand or interpret the signaling data content. Although it's SDP, even this doesn't matter so much: the content of the message going through the signaling server is, in effect, a black box. What does matter is when the ICE subsystem instructs you to send signaling data to the other peer, you do so, and the other peer knows how to receive this information and deliver it to its own ICE subsystem. All you have to do is channel the information back and forth. The contents don't matter at all to the signaling server.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要注意，服务器不需要理解或解释信令数据的内容。尽管它是SDP，但这无关紧要：通过信令服务器的消息内容实际上是一个黑匣子。重要的是，当ICE子系统指示您将信令数据发送到另一个对等方时，您这样做了，而另一个对等方知道如何接收此信息并将其传递到自己的ICE子系统。您要做的就是来回传递信息。内容与信令服务器无关紧要。

trans-unit.source: It's important to note that this will not reference the <script> element if the code in the script is being called as a callback or event handler; it will only reference the element while it's initially being processed.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要注意，如果 <script> 的代码被用作回调或事件处理程序，则此引用不会引用<script>元素；它只会在元素最初被处理时引用它。

trans-unit.source: It's important to remember the difference between constraints and settings. Constraints are a way to specify what values you need, want, and are willing to accept for the various constrainable properties (as described in the documentation for MediaTrackConstraints), while settings are the actual values of each constrainable property at the current time.
trans-unit.target: 记住约束和设置之间的区别很重要。约束是一种方法，用于指定各种约束属性（如 MediaTrackConstraints 的文档中所述）所需要，想要和愿意接受的值，而设置是当前每个约束属性的实际值。

trans-unit.source: It's modifiable descendant, DOMMatrix

trans-unit.source: It's not guaranteed that the element will be put into full screen mode. If permission to enter full screen mode is granted, the returned Promise will resolve and the element will receive a fullscreenchange event to let it know that it's now in full screen mode. If permission is denied, the promise is rejected and the element receives a fullscreenerror event instead. If the element has been detached from the original document, then the document receives these events instead.
trans-unit.target: 不保证该元素将进入全屏模式。如果授予进入全屏模式的权限，则返回的 Promise 将解析，并且该元素将收到 fullscreenchange 事件，以使其知道它现在处于全屏模式。如果权限被拒绝，则承诺将被拒绝，并且元素将接收 fullscreenerror 事件。如果元素已与原始文档分离，则文档将接收这些事件。

trans-unit.source: It's not guaranteed that you'll be able to switch into fullscreen mode. For example, <iframe> elements have the allowfullscreen attribute in order to opt-in to allowing their content to be displayed in fullscreen mode. In addition, certain kinds of content, such as windowed plug-ins, cannot be presented in fullscreen mode. Attempting to put an element which can't be displayed in fullscreen mode (or the parent or descendant of such an element) won't work. Instead, the element which requested fullscreen will receive a mozfullscreenerror event. When a fullscreen request fails, Firefox will log an error message to the Web Console explaining why the request failed. In Chrome and newer versions of Opera however, no such warning is generated.
trans-unit.target: 不保证您将能够切换到全屏模式。例如， <iframe> 元素具有 allowfullscreen 属性，以便选择允许其内容以全屏模式显示。此外，某些类型的内容（例如带窗口的插件）无法以全屏模式显示。尝试放置无法在全屏模式下显示的元素（或此类元素的父级或后代）将不起作用。相反，请求全屏显示的元素将收到 mozfullscreenerror 事件。当全屏请求失败时，Firefox会将错误消息记录到Web控制台，以说明请求失败的原因。但是，在Chrome和较新版本的Opera中，不会生成此类警告。

trans-unit.source: It's really useful for WebXR and gaming. In 3D spaces, it's the only way to achieve realistic audio. Libraries like three.js and A-frame harness its potential when dealing with sound. It's worth noting that you don't have to move sound within a full 3D space either — you could stick with just a 2D plane, so if you were planning a 2D game, this would still be the node you were looking for.
trans-unit.target: 对于WebXR和游戏而言，它确实非常有用。在3D空间中，这是获得逼真的音频的唯一方法。在处理声音时，诸如three.js和A框架之类的库可发挥其潜力。值得一提的是，你不具备要么移到一个完整的三维空间内的声音-你可以只用一个2D平面坚持，所以如果你正在计划一个2D游戏，这仍然会是你要找的节点。

trans-unit.source: It's straightforward enough to emulate phone dial (DTMF) sounds, by playing a couple of oscillators together using the methods we've already looked at, however, in this section, we'll load in a sample file instead so we can take a look at what's involved.

trans-unit.source: It's worth noting a key difference here between the Gecko and WebKit implementations at this time: Gecko automatically adds CSS rules to the element to stretch it to fill the screen: "width: 100%; height: 100%". WebKit doesn't do this; instead, it centers the fullscreen element at the same size in a screen that's otherwise black. To get the same fullscreen behavior in WebKit, you need to add your own "width: 100%; height: 100%;" CSS rules to the element yourself:
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是，此时Gecko和WebKit实现之间存在一个关键区别：Gecko自动向元素添加CSS规则以将其拉伸以填充屏幕：“ width: 100%; height: 100% ”。WebKit不会这样做。相反，它将全屏元素以相同大小居中显示在黑色屏幕上。要在WebKit中获得相同的全屏行为，您需要自己为元素添加“” width: 100%; height: 100%; “ CSS规则：

trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是，某些浏览器版本对此并不一致，除非另有特殊原因，否则在调用 removeEventListener() 时使用与 addEventListener() 调用相同的值可能是明智的。

trans-unit.source: It's worth noting that the Firefox's built-in Console object is compatible with the one provided by Firebug.
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是，Firefox的内置 Console 对象与Firebug提供的对象兼容。

trans-unit.source: It's worth noting that the pool of IDs used by setInterval() and setTimeout() are shared, which means you can technically use clearInterval() and clearTimeout() interchangeably. However, for clarity, you should avoid doing so.
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是， setInterval() 和 setTimeout() 使用的ID池是共享的，这意味着您可以在技术上互换使用 clearInterval() 和 clearTimeout() 。但是，为清楚起见，应避免这样做。

trans-unit.source: It's worth noting that the pool of IDs used by setTimeout() and setInterval() are shared, which means you can technically use clearTimeout() and clearInterval() interchangeably. However, for clarity, you should avoid doing so.
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是， setTimeout() 和 setInterval() 使用的ID池是共享的，这意味着您可以在技术上互换使用 clearTimeout() 和 clearInterval() 。但是，为清楚起见，应避免这样做。

trans-unit.source: It's worth noting that the signaling server does not actually need to understand or do anything with the data being exchanged through it by the two peers during signaling. The signaling server is, in essence, a relay: a common point which both sides connect to knowing that their signaling data can be transferred through it. The server doesn't need to react to this information in any way.
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是,信令服务器实际上并不需要理解或处理两个对等体在信令过程中通过它交换的数据。信令服务器在本质上是一个中继器:一个公共点,双方都知道自己的信令数据可以通过它来传输,就连接到这个公共点。服务器不需要以任何方式对这些信息做出反应。

trans-unit.source: JavaScript 1.8.5 introduces the Function.prototype.bind() method, which lets you specify the value that should be used as this for all calls to a given function. This lets you easily bypass problems where it's unclear what this will be, depending on the context from which your function was called. Also, ES2015 supports arrow functions, with lexical this allowing us to write setInterval( () => this.myMethod) if we're inside myArray method.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript的1.8.5介绍 Function.prototype.bind() 方法，它可以让你指定要用作值 this 对于一个给定函数的调用。这使您可以轻松地绕开尚不清楚的问题，具体取决于调用函数的上下文。此外，ES2015支持箭头函数，如果我们在myArray方法内部，那么使用词法可以使我们编写setInterval（（）=> this.myMethod）。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that some violation errors may be outside the ability of the user to fix. Try to avoid asking the user to make corrections to things they can't change, and there may be situations in which you need to allow validation errors to be accepted anyway (for example, if you validate addresses against a postal service database and a new home has been built and its address is not yet in the database).
trans-unit.target: 请记住,有些违规错误可能超出了用户的修正能力。尽量避免要求用户对他们无法改变的东西进行更正,而且在某些情况下,你可能需要允许接受验证错误(例如,如果你根据邮政服务数据库验证地址,而一个新的住宅已经建成,其地址还不在数据库中)。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that the more cookies you have, the more data will be transferred between the server and the client for each request. This will make each request slower. It is highly recommended for you to use WHATWG DOM Storage if you are going to keep "client-only" data.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，您拥有的Cookie越多，每个请求在服务器和客户端之间将传输更多的数据。这会使每个请求变慢。如果要保留“仅客户端”数据，强烈建议您使用WHATWG DOM Storage。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that this is part of the signaling process, the transport layer for which is an implementation detail that's entirely up to you. In this case, a WebSocket connection is used to send a JSON message with a type field with the value "video-answer" to the other peer, carrying the answer to the device which sent the offer to connect. The contents of the object being passed to the sendToServer() function, along with everything else in the promise fulfillment handler, depend entirely on your design
trans-unit.target: 请记住，这是信令过程的一部分，传输层的实现细节完全由您决定。在这种情况下，WebSocket连接用于向其他对等方发送 type 值为“ video-answer” 的JSON消息，并将其答案发送给发送要约的设备。传递给 sendToServer() 函数的对象的内容以及承诺履行处理程序中的所有其他内容完全取决于您的设计

trans-unit.source: Keep the framerate up (less than 30fps is uncomfortable.)
trans-unit.target: 保持帧率(低于30fps是不舒服的)。

trans-unit.source: Keeping latency to a minimum is especially important for WebRTC, since face-to-face communication needs to be performed with as little latency as possible. The more time lag there is between one user saying something and another hearing it, the more likely there is to be episodes of cross-talking and other forms of confusion.
trans-unit.target: 对于WebRTC而言，将等待时间降至最低尤为重要，因为面对面的通信需要以尽可能小的等待时间进行。一个用户说出某句话而另一用户听到某句话之间的时间间隔越长，发生串扰和其他形式的混乱的可能性就越大。

trans-unit.source: Latency is always prone to some variation due to hardware usage demands, network constraints, and so forth, so even in an "exact" match, some variation should be expected.
trans-unit.target: 由于硬件使用需求、网络限制等原因,延迟总是容易出现一些变化,所以即使是在 "完全 "匹配的情况下,也应该有一些变化。

trans-unit.source: Latency is the time between the physical head movement and the visual display reaching the user's eyes from the screen of an HMD being updated. This is one of the most critical factors in providing a realistic experience. Humans can detect very small delays — we need to keep the latency below 20 milliseconds if they are to be imperceptible (for example a 60Hz monitor has a 16 ms response.)
trans-unit.target: 延迟是指从更新的HMD的屏幕到实际的头部运动到视觉显示到达用户眼睛之间的时间。这是提供现实体验的最关键因素之一。人类可以检测到很小的延迟-如果要察觉不到，我们需要将延迟保持在20毫秒以下（例如60Hz监视器的响应时间为16 ms）。

trans-unit.source: Later version of the spec allow credentials to be retrieved from a different subdomain. For example, a password stored in login.example.com may be used to log in to www.example.com. To take advantage of this, a password must be explicitly stored by calling CredentialsContainer.store(). This is sometimes referred to as public suffix list (PSL) matching; however the spec only recommends using PSL to determine the effective scope of a credential. It does not require it. Hence browsers may vary in their implementation.
trans-unit.target: 规范的更高版本允许从其他子域检索凭证。例如，可以使用存储在 login.example.com 中的密码登录到 www.example.com 。要利用此优势，必须通过调用 CredentialsContainer.store() 显式存储密码。有时将其称为公共后缀列表（PSL）匹配。但是规范仅建议使用PSL来确定证书的有效范围。不需要它。因此，浏览器的实现可能会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Later versions of Chrome support the unprefixed MediaDevices.getUserMedia() which replaced this deprecated method.
trans-unit.target: Chrome的更高版本支持无前缀的 MediaDevices.getUserMedia() ，它取代了此不推荐使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Let's assume we want to render some 3D geometry, and for that we will need to supply our vertices to the Vertex Shader. Each vertex has a few attributes, like position, normal vector, or texture coordinate, that are defined in an ArrayBuffer and will be supplied to the Vertex Buffer Object (VBO). First, we need to bind the WebGLBuffer we want to use to gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, then, with this method, gl.vertexAttribPointer(), we specify in what order the attributes are stored, and what data type they are in. In addition, we need to include the stride, which is the total byte length of all attributes for one vertex. Also, we have to call gl.enableVertexAttribArray() to tell WebGL that this attribute should be filled with data from our array buffer.
trans-unit.target: 假设我们要渲染一些3D几何，为此，我们需要将顶点提供给“顶点着色器”。每个顶点都有一些属性，例如位置，法向矢量或纹理坐标，这些属性在 ArrayBuffer 中定义，并将提供给顶点缓冲区对象（VBO）。首先，我们需要将要使用的 WebGLBuffer 绑定到 gl.ARRAY_BUFFER ，然后使用 gl.vertexAttribPointer() 这种方法指定属性的存储顺序和存储的数据类型。我们需要包括跨度，即一个顶点所有属性的总字节长度。另外，我们必须调用 gl.enableVertexAttribArray() 告诉WebGL这个属性应该用数组缓冲区中的数据填充。

trans-unit.source: Let's have a more detailed look at the arc method, which takes six parameters: x and y are the coordinates of the center of the circle on which the arc should be drawn. radius is self-explanatory. The startAngle and endAngle parameters define the start and end points of the arc in radians, along the curve of the circle. These are measured from the x axis. The anticlockwise parameter is a Boolean value which, when true, draws the arc anticlockwise; otherwise, the arc is drawn clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 让我们更详细地了解 arc 方法，该方法有六个参数： x 和 y 是应在其上绘制圆弧的圆心的坐标。 radius 是不言自明的。在 startAngle 和 endAngle 参数以弧度定义弧的起点和终点，沿该圆的曲线。这些是从x轴测量的。该 anticlockwise 参数是一个布尔值，当 true ，画弧逆时针; 否则，将顺时针绘制圆弧。

trans-unit.source: Let's say that after the call to appendBuffer BUT before the updateend event fires (i.e. a buffer is being appended but the operation has not yet completed) a user "scrubs" the video seeking to a new point in time. In this case you would want to manually call abort() on the source buffer to stop the decoding of the current buffer, then fetch and append the newly requested segment that relates to the current new position of the video.
trans-unit.target: 假设在 updateend 事件触发之前（即，正在添加缓冲区但操作尚未完成的情况下）对 appendBuffer BUT 的调用之后，用户将视频“擦洗”到新的时间点。在这种情况下，您可能想手动在源缓冲区上调用 abort() 以停止当前缓冲区的解码，然后获取并追加与视频的当前新位置相关的新请求的段。

trans-unit.source: Let's take a look at the handler for the visibilitychange event. Our script receives this event when the document itself becomes visible or invisible. The most important scenario here is when the user switches tabs. Since Intersection Observer only cares about the intersection between the targeted elements and the intersection root, and not the tab's visibility (which is a different issue entirely), we need to use the Page Visibility API to detect these tab switches and disable our timers for the duration.
trans-unit.target: 让我们看一看 visibilitychange 事件的处理程序。当文档本身变为可见或不可见时，我们的脚本会接收此事件。这里最重要的情况是用户切换选项卡时。由于Intersection Observer只关心目标元素和相交根之间的交集，而不关心选项卡的可见性（这完全是另一个问题），因此我们需要使用Page Visibility API来检测这些选项卡开关并禁用计时器持续时间。
